text: The 1937–38 season was Aberdeen's 33rd season in the top flight of Scottish football and their 35th season overall. Aberdeen competed in the Scottish League Division One and the Scottish Cup. ==Results== ===Division One=== {|class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" ! Match Day ! Date ! Opponent ! H/A ! Score !
